column3: Latest; Kratie: A foreign man was found  hanging from a bridge in Prek Ta Thn village
column6: on the morning of July 22.------The foreigner
column7: identified as Juan Pablo Dalla Verde
column9: an Argentinean and a volunteer teacher at Khov Bunsun Kratie School
column10: and  was staying in Kratie province.------The victim tied a noose around his neck and threw himself over the bridge at some point over night for reasons unknown. Source: Immigration Department------Graphic images in------ link
